sourcesContent:
<template>
  <record-detail :recordId="recordId" />
</template>

<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'
import RecordDetail from '@/components/record/RecordDetail.vue'

export default {
  name: 'RecordDetailView',
  components: {
    RecordDetail
  },
  setup() {
    const route = useRoute()
    const recordId = ref(null)
    
    onMounted(() => {
      // 从路由参数中获取笔录ID
      recordId.value = route.params.id
    })
    
    return {
      recordId
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 视图容器样式 */
.record-detail-container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
</style>
